page.title: 01THROUGH CHILDRENS EYES
page.content: The land area around us is dominated by farmland.Our area is fairly quiet apart from where the A303 runs through from Sparkford to Wincanton.The A303 is especially busy in the summer with holiday makers. The area we are studying is made up of mainly grass lands with copses and small woods dotted around.There are 3 churches and aproximatly 30 footpaths .The roofs of houses are made of different materials tiles, slates and thatch.The older houses are built mainly of local stone.From the church tower we could see quite a lot although it was misty. We could see Compton Castle which is south east from the church tower.There are eight dairy farms in our block.
